short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MoveMyFunnels will easily move your funnels from CF 1.0 to the CF 2.0

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finally! No more manually moving your funnels over from ClickFunnels 1.0 to 2.0 - you can now literally move every single page you want over in a few seconds with a click of a button!
